on reading compounds: 簀【ス】mat (made of pieces of split bamboo or reeds tied together)
易簀【エキサク】the death of a scholar
kun reading compounds: 簀【す】mat (made of pieces of split bamboo or reeds tied together)
簾【すだれ】bamboo screen, rattan blind, bamboo mat (for rolling sushi)
巻きす【まきす】bamboo mat used in food preparation (esp. to roll sushi), sushi mat
生け簀【いけす】fish preserve, fish pen, holding pond, fish tank, live well, live-box
